question: 弁償
sourceMnemonic: My <kanji>dialect</kanji> has offended you? I will make <kanji>reparation</kanji> by giving you a <vocabulary>reimbursement</vocabulary> and some <vocabulary>compensation</vocabulary>. I'm sorry my dialect was so bad you couldn't understand the speech. Here's your money back.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
